sendMessages.label: Boemo ba tumello bo hlokahalang ho romella molaetsa
sendMessages.tooltip: 0 e bolela hore litho tsohle li ka romella melaetsa, 'me palo e kholo e bolela hore liphapang tse phahameng li hlokahala

invite.label: Ho hlokahala boemo ba tumello ho mema litho tse ncha
invite.tooltip: Seta mang ea ka mema litho tse ncha ka phapusing

kick.label: Raha boemo bo hlokahalang
kick.tooltip: Seta ea ka ralang litho tsa kamore

ban.label: Ho hlokahala boemo ba tumello bo hlokahalang bakeng sa ho thibela litho
ban.tooltip: Seta mang ea ka thibelang litho tsa kamore

roomSettings.label: Fetola boemo ba tumello bo hlokahalang tsa maemo a kamore
roomSettings.tooltip: Seta mang ea ka fetoleleng li-setting tsa kamore

toast.error: Ha rea ​​atleha ho ntlafatsa litlhophiso tsa tumello
